resources.string:
"ServiceLoader returned an empty list while looking for META-INF/services file: com.nextfaze.devfun.generated.DevFunGenerated
• This may be an issue with Proguard? See GitHub for configuration help: https://github.com/NextFaze/dev-fun#proguard
• This is also possibly due to an incremental build failing to propagate the service file definitions (a known Android Gradle build tools bug). The most assured way of fixing this is stopping gradle, deleting the gradle cache, and rebuilding the project:
./gradlew --stop rm -rf .gradle ./gradlew clean assembleDebug"
Error: A type could not be injected and does not have an input view assigned.
